name: D/D/D Cursed King Siegfried
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner "D/D" monsters
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up Spell/Trap on the field; negate its effects until the next Standby Phase. You can only use this effect of "D/D/D Cursed King Siegfried" once per turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the GY: Gain 1000 LP for each "Dark Contract" card you control.
